description: This table contains a list of cancer census genes from the current release.
friendlyName: COSMIC GRCH 37 CANCER GENE CENSUS V92 VERSIONED

fields.name: Gene_Symbol
fields.description: The gene name for which the data has been curated in COSMIC. In most cases this is the accepted HGNC identifier.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Descriptive name of the gene

fields.name: Entrez_GeneId
fields.description: Entrez gene ID for linking to Entrez website

fields.name: Genome_Location
fields.description: Genomic coordinates for gene

fields.name: Tier
fields.description: Classification Tier (1 or 2): Tier 2 of the Cancer Gene Census consists of genes with strong indications of roles in cancer but with less expansive available evidence, compared to Tier 1.

fields.name: Hallmark
fields.description: 'Yes' or blank (null)

fields.name: Chr_Band
fields.description: Chromosome band, eg 19p13.3

fields.name: Somatic
fields.description: Either 'yes' or blank

fields.name: Germline
fields.description: Either 'yes' or blank (usually blank)

fields.name: Tumour_Types_Somatic
fields.description: Comma-separated list of tumor types (or blank)

fields.name: Tumour_Types_Germline
fields.description: Comma-separated list of tumor types (or blank)

fields.name: Cancer_Syndrome
fields.description: Usually blank, but may specify, for example 'familial paraganglioma'

fields.name: Tissue_Type
fields.description: Comma-separated list of single-letter tissue-type abbreviations

fields.name: Molecular_Genetics
fields.description: Usually either 'Dom' (dominant) or 'Rec' (recessive)

fields.name: Role_in_Cancer
fields.description: E.g. 'oncogene', or 'TSG', etc

fields.name: Mutation_Types
fields.description: Comma-seperated list of mutation type abbreviations, eg 'Mis, N, F' (missense, nonsense, frameshift)

fields.name: Translocation_Partner
fields.description: Usually blank, but may list one or more other genes

fields.name: Other_Germline_Mut
fields.description: Either 'yes' or blank (usually blank)

fields.name: Other_Syndrome
fields.description: Usually blank, but may specify, for example 'IPEX-like syndrome'

fields.name: Synonyms
fields.description: Comma-separated list of synonyms for this gene
